channel.title: Note on Thought Voyager
channel.description: Recent content in Note on Thought Voyager

item.title: A Manifesto For The Future
item.description: All good and well do you maybe think at this point after reading some of my ideas, but what is the way forward then? In this post I want to give a short manifesto for how I imagine the future to be. Explanation in short Link to heading The future will be decentralized and sustainable where voluntary cooperation, market innovation and strong property rights foster community resilience without the need for (a) centralized authority.

item.title: Private Cities, the better alternative to country's
item.description: In this post will I explain what living in free private cities is like. This post is based on the book Free Private Cities by Titus Gebel
